Translations.Text: Era bategeeze nti (okuva engamiya lwezze) ddala amazzi ga kugabanyizibwa wakati waabwe nayo, nga buli luwalo lutuukirizibwa, (nyinirwo yaalina okufuna amazzi keebe ngamiya oba bantu)
Olwo nno baakowoola mu nnaabwe neyeesowolayo naafumita (engamiya)
Naye ebibonerezo byange n’okutiisa byali bitya
(Anti) mazima twabasindikira olubwatuka lumu, olwo nno ne baba nga ebisubi ebigwa okuva ku lugo (lwo muntu agenderera okukuuma ebisolo bye)
Mazima Kur’ani twagifuula nyangu, ebeere nga ebuulirira abaffe waliyo eyebuuliridde
Abantu ba Luutu baalimbisa obubaka
Mazima ffe twabasindikira kibuyaga owa mayinja (eyabasanyaawo bonna) okugyako abantu b’o mu maka ga Luutu, twabawonya mu ttumbi
Ekyo kyengera okuva gye tuli bwe tutyo nno, bwe tusasula oyo eyeebaza
Mazima (Luutu) yabeekesa okukwata kwaffe wabula nebabuusabuusa okulabula (kwe)
Mazima baagezaako okumusendasenda abawe abagenyi be (babasiyage) olwo nno netuziba amaaso gaabwe, ne bakomba ku bibonerezo byange n'okulabula kwange
Era mazima ebibonerezo ebitasalako bya bazinda mu matulutulu
Olwo nno nebakomba ku bibonerezo byange n’okulabula kwange
Mazima Kur’ani twagifuula nyangu ebeere nga ebuuririra abaffe waliyo eyebuuliridde
Mazima okulabula kwajjira abantu ba Firawo
Baalimbisa ebigambo byaffe byonna, olwo nno netubakwata enkwata ya Nantakubwa ku mukono, nannyini buyinza
Abakafiiri ba mmwe be balungi okusinga abo! oba (ekibayinula) mulina akalagaane ku butavunaanwa nga kawandiikibwa mu bitabo ebitukuvu ebyasooka
Oba (ekibayinula lwakuba) bagamba nti ffe tuli bangi nga twegasse tusobola okwetaasa
(Zibasanze) ekibiina (ekyo) kijja kuwangulwa era bakubeyo amabega (badduke)
(Byonna bye baliko temuli) wabula olunaku lw’enkomerero ye ndagaano yaabwe era olunaku lw’enkomerero lwelusinga obukalubo n’obukaawu
Mazima abonoonyi bali mu bubuze na bugwi bwa ddalu
(Bandibadde bajjukira) olunaku lwe baliwalulwa ku byenyi byabwe mu muliro (nga bwe bagambibwa nti) mukombe ku bulumi bw’omuliro Sakara
Mazima ffe buli kintu twakitonda mu ngeri nga bwe kisaana okuba
